name: Asymmetrical Buff Vessel
description:
Two kinds of stoneware make up the pattern on this piece. 
Matte on the outside and glazed in a dark red on the inside. Suitable as a vase or planter, it's waterproof & holds liquid. Signed on the base.

4" x 5" x 5"

$125

This item is made to order. The patterning on every piece is unique and will not exactly match the one pictured. Ships around two weeks from when your order is placed.

$125

This item is made to order. The patterning on every piece is unique and will not exactly match the one pictured. Ships around two weeks from when your order is placed.

name: Black & White Striped Stoneware Planter
description:
This planter is made from two types of stoneware that have been patterned by hand. There is a hole on the bottom for drainage.

The outside is matte. The inside is a satin dark metallic gray. Signed on the bottom. Approximately 5" x 6" x 6"

$100

This item is made to order. The patterning on every piece is unique and will not exactly match the one pictured. Ships around two weeks from when your order is placed.

name: Striped Stoneware Planter

Approximately 5" x 6" x 6"

name: Black & White Continuous Striped Planter
description:
The pattern on this piece is made from two types of stoneware. It is built in such a way that the pattern continues around the surface of the piece. 

The outer surface is matte, the interior is glazed.

$100
